<page title>: New Samsung MD46C Direct Lit Commercial LED Display (46")
features: Built-in speaker (10 + 10 W), magic clone (to USB), auto source switching & recovery, lamp error detection, super clear coating, temperature sensor, RS232C/RJ45 MDC, plug and play (DDC2B), clock battery, PIP/PBP, video wall (10 x 10), image rotation, button lock, smart scheduling, smart F/W update, built-in Magic Info (Lite, Premium-S, Videowall-S)
power consumption:
Typical: 65 W
Maximum: 121 W
Standby: < 0.5 W
